input_text:
Job Title: Digital Marketing Manager

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Marketing, Sales

Description:
Job Title: Digital Marketing ManagerLocation: Remote (United States)Industry: Coffee - RetailCompany: Our Client
About Our Client:
Our Client is a passionate and rapidly growing coffee company committed to providing exceptional coffee experiences to consumers across the nation. With a focus on sustainability, quality, and community, they source the finest coffee beans from around the world and craft unique blends that delight coffee enthusiasts.
Position Overview:
We are seeking a creative and results-driven Digital Marketing Manager to join our client's team. This role offers an exciting opportunity to lead digital marketing initiatives and elevate their brand presence in the competitive coffee industry, driving customer engagement and loyalty through innovative digital strategies.
Key Responsibilities:
Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns across multiple channels, including social media, email, and paid advertising, to promote our coffee products and brand message. Manage social media platforms, creating compelling content, engaging with followers, and fostering community engagement to build brand awareness and drive customer acquisition. Optimize website content and user experience to enhance online visibility, increase traffic, and drive conversions through SEO best practices and website analytics. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and launch new product offerings, promotions, and marketing campaigns that resonate with our target audience. Monitor digital marketing performance metrics, analyze data, and generate reports to measure campaign effectiveness and identify areas for optimization and improvement. Stay informed on industry trends, competitor activities, and emerging technologies to maintain a competitive edge and drive innovation in coffee marketing. 
Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field; advanced degree or certification in digital marketing is a plus. Proven track record of success in digital marketing roles, with a minimum of 3 years of experience in consumer goods or food and beverage industry, preferably in coffee or related field. Expertise in digital marketing platforms and tools, including social media management tools, email marketing software, and web analytics platforms. Strong creative skills and ability to develop engaging content, graphics, and multimedia assets that resonate with target audiences and drive engagement. Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a remote team environment and build relationships with internal and external stakeholders. 
Benefits:
Competitive salary package with performance-based bonuses. Flexible remote work environment, allowing for work-life balance and flexibility. Opportunities for professional development and career growth through training programs and industry conferences. Collaborative virtual team culture with regular team meetings and networking opportunities. Discounts on coffee products and merchandise for all employees. 
Join Our Client's remote team and be part of a passionate and innovative company that is redefining the coffee experience for consumers nationwide. Apply today to contribute to their mission of delivering exceptional coffee moments to every cup.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Digital Marketing Manager
output_json.summary: Creative and results-driven Digital Marketing Manager sought for a growing coffee company.
preferred_degrees: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field
optional_skills: Advanced degree or certification in digital marketing
soft_skills: Ability to work effectively in a remote team environment
Building relationships with internal and external stakeholders
job_responsibilities: Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns across multiple channels
Optimize website content and user experience
benefits: Discounts on coffee products and merchandise
output_json.company_information: Our Client is a passionate and rapidly growing coffee company committed to providing exceptional coffee experiences to consumers across the nation.
